name: Olukai Punua Olu Slides - Women's
description: Pūnua 'Olu translates to “fledgling, comfort.” Olukai named them for the new levels of comfort you'll discover with these lightweight sandals.Synthetic water-resistant uppers have a soft jersey lining.Anatomical PU footbed offers all-day support and has a supple texture for improved grip.Non-marking outsole uses Olukai’s wet grip rubber to offer enhanced traction on wet surfaces.A portion of all proceeds supports the Ama OluKai Foundation, honouring those who preserve and celebrate the cultural heritage and Aloha spirit of Hawai‘i.
